creator: marco.dongu@softeco.it
text:
If I try to take the value of an attribute from a Script element, like below	
_str=_e.getAttributeNS(null, "xlink:href");
I obtain nothing. The problem shows only for some attributes, not any.
If the attribute is "xlink:type", the getAttributeNS functions correctly.
Thanks again.

creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
text:
Marco,

To get attributes in a particular namespace, you should use the getAttributeNS
method with the corresponding namespace value. For example:

var xlinkNS = "http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" ;
str = e.getAttributeNS(xlinkNS, "href");

This is not a bug in Batik, so I close the bug.
Regards,
Vincent.
